result.markdown: --- title: "Obtaining Willingness to Pay Estimates from Preference Space and Willingness to Pay Space Utility Models" description: | My talk for the 2021 Sawtooth Conference Turbo Choice Modeling Panel date: 04-20-2021 preview: "sawtooth-conf-logitr.png" categories: - R - surveys - conjoint format: html toc: true --- I gave a talk at the Sawtooth Software Conference [Turbo Choice Modeling Seminar](https://events.sawtoothsoftware.com/turboseminar) in San Antonio, Texas, April 19-23, 2021 (I pre-recorded my talk as I did not attend in-person). The talk is titled, "The [{logitr}](https://jhelvy.github.io/logitr/) R Package: Obtaining Willingness to Pay Estimates from Preference Space and Willingness to Pay Space Utility Models". Learn more about the {logitr} package [here](https://jhelvy.github.io/logitr/). # Talk # Slides My slides were built using the [{xaringan}](https://github.com/yihui/xaringan) R package. You can see the source code for the slides [here](https://github.com/jhelvy/2021-sawtooth-conf). ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html} Full screen slides ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html} Slides as PDF ``` ::: ::: Keyboard Shortcuts for Slides: - Use ← and → to navigate through the slides. - Use f to toggle full screen. - Use o to view an overview of all slides. - Use h to see a list of other shortcuts. ::: golden-ratio-wrapper ``` :::
